verses.text: In the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* they \add into\add* the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

For they were \w departed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Rephidim|strong="H7508"\w*, and were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add to\add* the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, and had \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; and there \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* before the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto him out of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

Ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* what I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and \add how\add* I \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* you on \w eagles’|strong="H5404"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* you unto myself.

Now therefore, if ye will \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w indeed|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, then ye shall be a peculiar \w treasure|strong="H5459"\w* unto me above all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* mine:

And ye shall be unto me a \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* before their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, All that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* we will \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Lo, I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee in a \w thick|strong="H5645"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* may \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* when I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with thee, and \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* thee for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*, and let them \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* their \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*,

And be \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* against the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

And thou shalt set \w bounds|strong="H1379"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to yourselves, \add that ye\add* go \add not\add* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, or \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* the \w border|strong="H7097"\w* of it: whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* shall be \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*:

There shall not an \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* it, but he shall \w surely|strong="H5619"\w* be \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w shot|strong="H3384"\w* \w through|strong="H3384"\w*; whether \add it be\add* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, it shall not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: when the \w trumpet|strong="H3104"\w* soundeth \w long|strong="H4900"\w*, they shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 19.13 \ft trumpet: or, cornet\f*

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and they \w washed|strong="H3526"\w* their \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* against the \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w come|strong="H5066"\w* not at \add your\add* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, that there were \w thunders|strong="H6963"\w* and \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w*, and a \w thick|strong="H3515"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* upon the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w loud|strong="H2389"\w*; so that all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add was\add* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* out of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* with \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and they \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* at the \w nether|strong="H8482"\w* part of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

And \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* was altogether on a \w smoke|strong="H6225"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* upon it in \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and the \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* thereof \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* as the \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* of a \w furnace|strong="H3536"\w*, and the whole \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w quaked|strong="H2729"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*.

And when the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w sounded|strong="H6963"\w* \w long|strong="H1980"\w*, and waxed \w louder|strong="H2390"\w* and \w louder|strong="H3966"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him by a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \add up\add* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*; and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Go \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w charge|strong="H5749"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, lest they break \w through|strong="H2040"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w gaze|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* of them \w perish|strong="H5307"\w*.  +  r 19.21  t charge: Heb. contest *

And let the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* also, which come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* themselves, lest the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* break \w forth|strong="H6555"\w* upon them.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*: for thou \w chargedst|strong="H5749"\w* us, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Set \w bounds|strong="H1379"\w* about the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* it.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Away|strong="H3212"\w*, get thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and thou shalt come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, thou, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* with thee: but let not the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* break \w through|strong="H2040"\w* to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, lest he break \w forth|strong="H6555"\w* upon them.
So \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto them.
